Text:
This is at least the third popup-riddled image host we've had to block you from linking to.  You're obviously not trustworthy so I've removed your trusted status.  

Don't be linking to sites like that again.
Soda, It most just be you. I clicked on the links with no popups at all.
I have had no problems with this poster.Please restore his status.His posts are always well seeded.
